title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, the classpath and output location settings are not being updated correctly.
EB: After changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, the classpath and output location settings should be updated accordingly.
SR: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. Open the project properties. 3. Change the setting to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location. 4. Verify that the classpath and output location settings are updated correctly.
